QuestData.Title: The Curse of Zin-Malor
QuestData.Description: You have seen enough. Know that the Crystal of Zin-Malor brings only ruin to all around it.$B$BLeave this place, if you do not wish to join us.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Kelek Skykeeper at Lake Kel'theril in Winterspring.
QuestData.RewardText: The shade! Yes, I saw it too!
